description: The file is an HTML webpage that serves as a UI for visualizing database contents. It includes embedded CSS styles for layout and appearance, as well as JavaScript code responsible for fetching database, table, and data information via API calls, and rendering the data in tabular form with interactive features such as expandable cells.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets current selection

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses a database to show/hide its tables

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data from a specific table and renders it in a table format

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table to display data records

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell contents, handling strings, objects, nulls, and long content

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding and collapsing cell content for long strings or objects
